notes:
# Round 1

## Power(s)
- [Bango!](item_b48a6731-fae8-4732-aae0-ceffbf324235) 

## Items
- [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0) **(Buy)**
- [Power Playbook](item_6d8803cf-baa7-46ee-af91-51e7f2301418) **(Buy)**
- [Armored Vest](item_358361e2-59be-4c81-b221-8a87f37809e6) **(Buy)**

## Info
- Round 1 is fairly straightforward. Take [Bango!](item_b48a6731-fae8-4732-aae0-ceffbf324235) as the 20% extra damage from direct hits is quite powerful,  [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0) and [Power Playbook](item_6d8803cf-baa7-46ee-af91-51e7f2301418) provide enough power to make your shots and mines hit harder, and [Armored Vest](item_358361e2-59be-4c81-b221-8a87f37809e6) just for more survival

# Round 2

## Items
- [Spiked Gloves](item_70573d1b-b952-4418-a13f-5728ff472a07) **(Buy)**
- [Custom Stock](item_17d633af-8bcc-4893-b865-be0a7bc66fe2) **(Buy)**
- [Charged Plating](item_b8ca58e7-6ae2-40ee-8618-fe2f32315295) **(Buy if possible)**
- [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0) (Keep)
- [Power Playbook](item_6d8803cf-baa7-46ee-af91-51e7f2301418) (Keep)
- [Armored Vest](item_358361e2-59be-4c81-b221-8a87f37809e6) (Keep)

## Info
- While [Zip Grease](item_f1f004d4-d091-42e9-b34e-2b12f56e82c6) is the key item of this build, do NOT buy it this round. You want to spread your cash out to give you more power so Zip Grease can hit harder when you do get it!
- Instead, [Spiked Gloves](item_70573d1b-b952-4418-a13f-5728ff472a07) provides quite a nice bonus to your damage if you can hit airshots without  [Zip Grease](item_f1f004d4-d091-42e9-b34e-2b12f56e82c6), [Custom Stock](item_17d633af-8bcc-4893-b865-be0a7bc66fe2) gives your mines and bombs a bit more power for the round, and [Charged Plating](item_b8ca58e7-6ae2-40ee-8618-fe2f32315295) will give you some more survivability and empower your mines and tire further when you first use tire, if you have the cash spare to afford it
- Keep the items you bought in Round 1, as those stats and armour will help you deal more damage and finish off weak targets so you can afford [Zip Grease](item_f1f004d4-d091-42e9-b34e-2b12f56e82c6) next round!

# Round 3

## Power(s)
- [Bingo!](item_1234b16b-1426-4a0c-b6c3-213180336cc6)

## Items
- [Zip Grease](item_f1f004d4-d091-42e9-b34e-2b12f56e82c6) **(Buy)**
- [Spiked Gloves](item_70573d1b-b952-4418-a13f-5728ff472a07) (Keep)
- [Charged Plating](item_b8ca58e7-6ae2-40ee-8618-fe2f32315295) (Keep)
- [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0) (Keep)
- [Power Playbook](item_6d8803cf-baa7-46ee-af91-51e7f2301418) (Keep)
- [Armored Vest](item_358361e2-59be-4c81-b221-8a87f37809e6) (Keep)
- [Custom Stock](item_17d633af-8bcc-4893-b865-be0a7bc66fe2) *(Sell)*

## Info
-  We take [Bingo!](item_1234b16b-1426-4a0c-b6c3-213180336cc6) here due to the general intention to hit direct shots, which will reduce the cooldowns of your abilities, allowing you to use your Concussive Mine more often, which in turn allows you to trigger [Zip Grease](item_f1f004d4-d091-42e9-b34e-2b12f56e82c6) more often!
- This is where the fun REALLY starts. Now that you have your hands on [Zip Grease](item_f1f004d4-d091-42e9-b34e-2b12f56e82c6), your gameplay should change significantly. Instead of spamming like you may have been doing in the prior rounds, you wanna be *patient* with your shots, playing more like a sniper than a spammer. The extra projectile speed from [Zip Grease](item_f1f004d4-d091-42e9-b34e-2b12f56e82c6) allows you to fire out extremely precise shots with high damage thanks to [Bango!](item_b48a6731-fae8-4732-aae0-ceffbf324235), which are especially effective against airborne targets (Either flying characters like Juno/Mercy/Freja, or targets sent airborne by your mines or teammates' knockback), or certain characters with deflect/absorb abilities that'd normally benefit highly from Junk's spam (Sigma's Grasp, Zarya's Bubbles, Orisa/Genji's Deflects)
- As mentioned before, you wanna play a bit further back, almost like a sniper. The extra 10% damage to airborne targets provided by both [Zip Grease](item_f1f004d4-d091-42e9-b34e-2b12f56e82c6) *and* [Spiked Gloves](item_70573d1b-b952-4418-a13f-5728ff472a07) each will make you super effective against fliers, and you can even throw your mine into the enemy team to knock them airborne and possibly shoot them for extremely high damage. However, you don't *need* to only target airborne targets, the high speed of [Zip Grease](item_f1f004d4-d091-42e9-b34e-2b12f56e82c6) shots turns them into extremely reliable projectiles for hitting distant enemies! This allows the build to work incredibly well against the hitscan heroes of the current Stadium roster (Soldier/Cassidy/Ashe) as you are now able to contest them from a distance that you wouldn't be able to before!

# Round 4

##Items
- [Three-tap Tommygun](item_39c5d2a4-1db0-444f-86d9-2a1e9a331429) **(Buy)**
- [Zip Grease](item_f1f004d4-d091-42e9-b34e-2b12f56e82c6) (Keep)
- [Spiked Gloves](item_70573d1b-b952-4418-a13f-5728ff472a07) (Keep)
- [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0) (Keep)
- [Power Playbook](item_6d8803cf-baa7-46ee-af91-51e7f2301418) (Keep)
- [Armored Vest](item_358361e2-59be-4c81-b221-8a87f37809e6) (Keep)
- [Charged Plating](item_b8ca58e7-6ae2-40ee-8618-fe2f32315295) *(Sell)*

## Info
- [Three-tap Tommygun](item_39c5d2a4-1db0-444f-86d9-2a1e9a331429) is the name of the game here, and this is for a very simple reason: The burn from direct hits with [Bango!](item_b48a6731-fae8-4732-aae0-ceffbf324235) count as *Weapon Damage*, which means that the burn *triggers the 3% total life damage of* [Three-tap Tommygun](item_39c5d2a4-1db0-444f-86d9-2a1e9a331429). If you hit someone directly after using an ability, they will immediately lose 9% of their HP on top of the damage from the direct hit frag, and then if you throw out your abilities directly following, they lose 9% more of their health in damage for *each ability you throw* while they burn
- [Bingo!](item_1234b16b-1426-4a0c-b6c3-213180336cc6) is especially important with this interaction, as direct hits will quickly give you back your mine and trap cooldowns, which in turn allows you to trigger [Three-tap Tommygun](item_39c5d2a4-1db0-444f-86d9-2a1e9a331429) and similar items even more frequently!
- As a small note, Junkrat's Steel Trap is a little weird with how it triggers "On ability use" effects. Just throwing it out doesn't trigger them, it seems to only trigger those item effects ([Three-tap Tommygun](item_39c5d2a4-1db0-444f-86d9-2a1e9a331429), [Hardlight Accelerator](item_0390c8af-2a68-4da2-b876-93da32c3f448), [Mark of the Kitsune](item_09a53e39-25aa-4f66-ba51-bedbc543a1eb)) when the trap actually *lands*, but even that feels a little inconsistent as well. I've found the most consistency from throwing Trap directly downward, which seems to *most* of the time trigger the effects of [Three-tap Tommygun](item_39c5d2a4-1db0-444f-86d9-2a1e9a331429) for you to take advantage of!

# Round 5

## Power(s)
As a quick note, the third and fourth pwoer mostly come down to preference. I personally like [Rip Roll](item_899150b0-bd59-4bc9-a9b9-7f53e0383df9), but [Hop Boom](item_7f85e3a0-02ad-4de5-af4c-1d89f779dc8a) and [It's A(nother) Trap!](item_850f4701-cb41-4083-ba0e-7f96b6757025) also help the build quite a bit too!
- [Hop Boom](item_7f85e3a0-02ad-4de5-af4c-1d89f779dc8a) *(Optional)* (The extra mine explosion is not only good for mobility, but if you shoot your [Zip Grease](item_f1f004d4-d091-42e9-b34e-2b12f56e82c6) shots before the second mine goes off, then it'll refresh your shots for free!)
- [Rip Roll](item_899150b0-bd59-4bc9-a9b9-7f53e0383df9) *(Optional)* (I personally like this a lot just because you get your ult quite fast, and since this build scales some AP, it means Rip-Tire is still a rather effective tool!)
- [It's A(nother) Trap!](item_850f4701-cb41-4083-ba0e-7f96b6757025) *(Optional)* (Having a second trap on the field is honestly surprisingly good, but the main impact of this is that it allows you extra triggers of [Three-tap Tommygun](item_39c5d2a4-1db0-444f-86d9-2a1e9a331429) and similar items!)

## Items
- [Superflexor](item_580b77b4-0d63-469b-99a8-5372c55dfc1b) **(Buy)**
- [Three-tap Tommygun](item_39c5d2a4-1db0-444f-86d9-2a1e9a331429) (Keep)
- [Zip Grease](item_f1f004d4-d091-42e9-b34e-2b12f56e82c6) (Keep)
- [Spiked Gloves](item_70573d1b-b952-4418-a13f-5728ff472a07) (Keep)
- [Power Playbook](item_6d8803cf-baa7-46ee-af91-51e7f2301418) (Keep)
- [Armored Vest](item_358361e2-59be-4c81-b221-8a87f37809e6) (Keep)
- [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0) *(Sell)*
- [Mark of the Kitsune](item_09a53e39-25aa-4f66-ba51-bedbc543a1eb) *(Optional)*
- [Hardlight Accelerator](item_0390c8af-2a68-4da2-b876-93da32c3f448) *(Optional)*
- [Phantasmic Flux](item_5e644a79-cf6e-4196-8d0a-232f75004643) *(Optional)*
- [Lumerico Fusion Drive](item_3da81000-333c-460a-a1a2-09441bfda9c8) *(Optional)*

## Info
- Now, in the previous round's notes I mentioned that [Mark of the Kitsune](item_09a53e39-25aa-4f66-ba51-bedbc543a1eb) also has its effect triggered by [Bango!](item_b48a6731-fae8-4732-aae0-ceffbf324235)'s burn! This is still a great option, however, I like [Superflexor](item_580b77b4-0d63-469b-99a8-5372c55dfc1b) as once again, [Bango!](item_b48a6731-fae8-4732-aae0-ceffbf324235)'s burn *also* triggers the 5 stacks of 5% AP. This means on *any* direct hit, you immediately have an extra 25% AP, on top of whatever you already have. This makes your mines incredibly good, and not only makes them a great finisher, but also puts enemies closer to being one-shot by an airborne shot from [Zip Grease](item_f1f004d4-d091-42e9-b34e-2b12f56e82c6)!
- At this point though, you have the core of the build down. Any extra powers or items are fully dependant on your own preferences, or what you need to counterbuild towards. If you're already doing quite well, [Mark of the Kitsune](item_09a53e39-25aa-4f66-ba51-bedbc543a1eb) or [Hardlight Accelerator](item_0390c8af-2a68-4da2-b876-93da32c3f448) can increase your power quite a bit further, but if you need extra survival, then [Lumerico Fusion Drive](item_3da81000-333c-460a-a1a2-09441bfda9c8) can keep you alive with how often you throw out abilities, and [Phantasmic Flux](item_5e644a79-cf6e-4196-8d0a-232f75004643) not only boosts your damage even further, but can give you lots of self-healing and even overhealth as you're hitting your shots! I'm sure other items can work quite well as well, but these are the ones I think work best with this build because of the benefits they provide
- You can easily go forward on your own from here, but the guide will continue to showcase what I personally find to be the best outcome for this build!

# Round 6

## Items
- [Mark of the Kitsune](item_09a53e39-25aa-4f66-ba51-bedbc543a1eb) **(Buy)**
- [Superflexor](item_580b77b4-0d63-469b-99a8-5372c55dfc1b) (Keep)
- [Three-tap Tommygun](item_39c5d2a4-1db0-444f-86d9-2a1e9a331429) (Keep)
- [Zip Grease](item_f1f004d4-d091-42e9-b34e-2b12f56e82c6) (Keep)
- [Spiked Gloves](item_70573d1b-b952-4418-a13f-5728ff472a07) (Keep)
- [Power Playbook](item_6d8803cf-baa7-46ee-af91-51e7f2301418) (Keep)
- [Armored Vest](item_358361e2-59be-4c81-b221-8a87f37809e6) *(Sell)*
- [Eye of the Spider](item_bbaf01d7-340d-4199-b738-86a98d68fe9b) *(Optional)*
- [Hardlight Accelerator](item_0390c8af-2a68-4da2-b876-93da32c3f448) *(Optional)*
- [Phantasmic Flux](item_5e644a79-cf6e-4196-8d0a-232f75004643) *(Optional)*
- [Lumerico Fusion Drive](item_3da81000-333c-460a-a1a2-09441bfda9c8) *(Optional)*

## Info
- As mentioned prior, [Mark of the Kitsune](item_09a53e39-25aa-4f66-ba51-bedbc543a1eb) is super strong here, for the same reason that [Three-tap Tommygun](item_39c5d2a4-1db0-444f-86d9-2a1e9a331429) is; [Bango!](item_b48a6731-fae8-4732-aae0-ceffbf324235)'s burn applies their damage effects! Combined with your stacked AP from [Superflexor](item_580b77b4-0d63-469b-99a8-5372c55dfc1b), this means you can do a ton of extra damage after a direct hit, *especially* if you've taken [It's A(nother) Trap!](item_850f4701-cb41-4083-ba0e-7f96b6757025) to have one more ability that applies these effects! (Even though traps are weirdly inconsistent, remember to let them land fast!) [Bingo!](item_1234b16b-1426-4a0c-b6c3-213180336cc6) also helps quite a lot with this too, as mentioned in Round 4's notes!
- The same notes as previous go for the *(Optional)* items here, [Hardlight Accelerator](item_0390c8af-2a68-4da2-b876-93da32c3f448) is great for more WP, [Lumerico Fusion Drive](item_3da81000-333c-460a-a1a2-09441bfda9c8) is great for survival, and [Phantasmic Flux](item_5e644a79-cf6e-4196-8d0a-232f75004643) is decent at both! [Eye of the Spider](item_bbaf01d7-340d-4199-b738-86a98d68fe9b) is the new addition here, which is solely because 25% extra WP makes your airborne shots even stronger than before, probably allowing you to one-shot or two-shot most aerial enemies by this point, and do devastating damage to the enemy tank!

# Round 7

## Power(s)
Same as Round 5, the power here is up to preference! Once again though, I still think these three benefit the build the most compared to other powers
- [Hop Boom](item_7f85e3a0-02ad-4de5-af4c-1d89f779dc8a) *(Optional)*
- [Rip Roll](item_899150b0-bd59-4bc9-a9b9-7f53e0383df9) *(Optional)*
- [It's A(nother) Trap!](item_850f4701-cb41-4083-ba0e-7f96b6757025) *(Optional)*

## Items
- [Hardlight Accelerator](item_0390c8af-2a68-4da2-b876-93da32c3f448) **(Buy)**
- [Mark of the Kitsune](item_09a53e39-25aa-4f66-ba51-bedbc543a1eb) (Keep)
- [Superflexor](item_580b77b4-0d63-469b-99a8-5372c55dfc1b) (Keep)
- [Three-tap Tommygun](item_39c5d2a4-1db0-444f-86d9-2a1e9a331429) (Keep)
- [Zip Grease](item_f1f004d4-d091-42e9-b34e-2b12f56e82c6) (Keep)
- [Spiked Gloves](item_70573d1b-b952-4418-a13f-5728ff472a07) (Keep)
- [Power Playbook](item_6d8803cf-baa7-46ee-af91-51e7f2301418) *(Sell)*
- [Cybervenom](item_210a8582-91ec-4cf3-968a-a443f3a0c505) *(Optional)*
- [Liquid Nitrogen](item_a8d99526-05a3-4405-babb-b025479b1b98) *(Optional)*
- [Eye of the Spider](item_bbaf01d7-340d-4199-b738-86a98d68fe9b) *(Optional)*
- [Phantasmic Flux](item_5e644a79-cf6e-4196-8d0a-232f75004643) *(Optional)*
- [Lumerico Fusion Drive](item_3da81000-333c-460a-a1a2-09441bfda9c8) *(Optional)*

## Info
- If you've somehow ended up on Round 7, the final item is fully your choice. I'd personally go for [Hardlight Accelerator](item_0390c8af-2a68-4da2-b876-93da32c3f448) due to the extra WP, AP, and CDR it provides, however I could see myself going for any of the optional items depending on what I need the most! New inclusions here are [Cybervenom](item_210a8582-91ec-4cf3-968a-a443f3a0c505) and [Liquid Nitrogen](item_a8d99526-05a3-4405-babb-b025479b1b98), which are both quite self-explanatory. While Junkrat doesn't have as rapid ability damage as characters like Moira/Soldier/Juno/Lucio, he still does send out ability damage quite often with his mines and traps! [Liquid Nitrogen](item_a8d99526-05a3-4405-babb-b025479b1b98)''s slow can help quite a lot for hitting airshots, as the target blasted up won't be able to move nearly as much in the air, but if healing is a problem, [Cybervenom](item_210a8582-91ec-4cf3-968a-a443f3a0c505) can be quite helpful due to the anti-heal on top of the disruption, even making it harder for supports to heal away the damage you're doing with [Three-tap Tommygun](item_39c5d2a4-1db0-444f-86d9-2a1e9a331429) and [Mark of the Kitsune](item_09a53e39-25aa-4f66-ba51-bedbc543a1eb) with [Bango!](item_b48a6731-fae8-4732-aae0-ceffbf324235)!
